0:
set -e
source /opt/recipes/venv/bin/activate
echo "Updating database"
python3 /opt/recipes/manage.py migrate
python3 /opt/recipes/manage.py collectstatic_js_reverse
python3 /opt/recipes/manage.py collectstatic --noinput

/hr/ghcr.io-bernd-schorgers-helm-app-tem.title: immich-machine-learning helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-bernd-schorgers-helm-app-tem.name: immich-machine-learning
/hr/ghcr.io-bernd-schorgers-helm-app-tem.doc:
Immich is a self-hosted photo and video backup solution.

For immich, there are multiple helm deployments:

  • immich-web
  • immich-server
  • immich-typesense
  • immich-machine-learning (this one)
  • immich-microservices

For redis and postgres, there are multiple helm charts:

  • Redis: app-template/redis, bitnami/redis
  • PostgreSQL: operator cloudnative-pg/cloudnative-pg, bitnami bitnami/postgresql

/hr/ghcr.io-bernd-schorgers-helm-app-tem.title: immich-server helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-bernd-schorgers-helm-app-tem.name: immich-server
/hr/ghcr.io-bernd-schorgers-helm-app-tem.doc:
Immich is a self-hosted photo and video backup solution.

For immich, there are multiple helm deployments:

  • immich-web
  • immich-server (this one)
  • immich-typesense
  • immich-machine-learning
  • immich-microservices

For redis and postgres, there are multiple helm charts:

  • Redis: app-template/redis, bitnami/redis
  • PostgreSQL: operator cloudnative-pg/cloudnative-pg, bitnami bitnami/postgresql

0:
apt update
apt -y install gettext-base
envsubst < /kubefiles/server-settings.json > /factorio/config/server-settings.json
exec /docker-entrypoint.sh

version: v1
flags:
  migStrategy: none
sharing:
  timeSlicing:
    renameByDefault: false
    failRequestsGreaterThanOne: false
    resources:
      - name: nvidia.com/gpu
        replicas: 4
